pageProduct.name: Plunkett Pure Aloe Vera 90% Moisturiser 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Certifed organic Aloe Vera soothing & hydrating moisturising lotion for nourished skin all year round

Plunkett's Hi-Potency Aloe Vera Moisturiser uses Pure Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice. It also contains natural Vitamin E, Shea Butter & Cucumber. This natural moisturiser is perfect for face and body. Easily absorbed by your skin, it refreshes and hydrates for soft, smooth skin all year round. Contains no parabens or artificial colours or fragrance.

Suitable For: Suitable for dry skin

Size: 200mL

KEY FEATURES

• Essential vitamins, nutirents and natural moisturisers nourish your skin with each application.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid the eye area. Store below 30°

Ingredients

Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis leaf Juice (90% Aloe Vera), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin

Active Ingredients: Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis leaf Juice (90% Aloe Vera), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter

Directions

Apply liberally as often as required. Suitable for daily use on face and body.
